name: Rio2050
description:
Rio 2050 is a Graduation Video Game Prototype - June 2017

PITCH

Rio2050 a lieu dans un avenir dystopique au Rio de Janeiro ou Scipher est une entreprise qui contrôle toute la politique et les services de Rio. Vous incarnez Camilia un ancien agent de Scipher, pendant sa première mission elle constate que les forces de Scipher tuent des innocents dans les favelas. Elle tue toute son unité et séjourne dans les favelas pour les libérer de l'opression de Scipher.

Rio2050 takes place in a dystopian future in Rio de Janeiro. Scipher is a company that control all politics and services in Rio. You play as Camilia a former agent of scipher, during her first mission she find that Scipher forces kill innocent people in the favelas. She kills all her unit and stay in the favel as to free them from the opression of Scipher.

DETAILS

Developer : ArtFX - Montpellier (France)
Release : June 2017
Game plateform : PC
Genre : Shooter, FirstPerson, ThirdPerson
Language : English (menus) ; Game without text or voice
PEGI 16 (not officially rated)

CREDITS

Sylvain MORIN - Lead project / Game designer
Nicolas COUNIL - Game designer / Community manager
Hugo SAAL - Level Designer
Arthur GRAULIERE - Lead Artist / 3D Artist
Jerome RAJCEK - 3D Artist
Benjamin GALINIER - 3D Artist
Valentin LANNES - 3D Artist
